title: How would you rank Yiren (Everglow), Wonyoung (Iz*one), and Yuna (Itzy) in different categories? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m no dance nor rap coach so that’s all subjective but i’ll be objective in vocals. this will be a long answer, sorry xx ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~/////~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ dancing: 1.Yuna  why: for me every ITZY member has the skills to be a main dancer in any other group, Yuna has everything and she’s personally for me the best performer not only between these 3 but also in ITZY. I think her biggest issue is that she isn’t as versatile or has shown much versatility like number 2 on the list but we’ll have to wait and see. 2.Yiren  Why: I think Yiren deserves this spot because of how centered her technique is. My sister is a dancer and really likes her hip and torso control. Her background in modern dancing has helped her strengthen her flexibility and gave her a well rounded technique. I think she has some small issues with idol choreos. Like she’s great in modern Chinese dancing but when it comes to idol dancing she sometimes gets too stiff, loses her facials and tends to rush some moves but she’s improving. 3.Wonyoung  Why: although she’s last she’s definitely not a bad dancer not even close. She has sharp movements and shows a good consistency throughout all her performance, her biggest plus point which Yiren doesn’t really have is THAT star stage presence. You can be a weak dancer but have amazing stage presence and make everyone appreciate and like your performances. I’ve watched a video and he/she said that she has issues with her hands, angels, torso control and body balance which to me sound like more serious problems then the other 2. ———————————————next category——-——-—————————————— rapping: 1.Yuna  why: she’s the only one with a high rapping position and i also think she’s in general the best rapper here. It wasn’t untill this album that she showcased actual rapping like in That’s a no no. 2.Wonyoung  why: i placed her higher then Yiren because she has actually showcased some rapping(i think) it was more talking but that’s better then Yiren who has barely showed us anything. 3.Yiren  why: because she hasn’t rapped, simple xx ———————————————next category——-——-—————————————— vocals: 1.Yuna  why: all 3 are on the weaker side but Yuna has definitely shown way more vocal performances that are technically more correct. She sings very nicely when she doesn’t try to go above her mid belts, like in Dalla Dalla’s bridge she sounds very nice and shows nice dynamics but in Nobody Like You (ik it’s more chanting) but on the ‘’you’’ parts you can hear her struggling and just pulling up her chest voice. NobodyLikeYouChoreography 2.Wonyoung  why: she’s not really in charge of the vocals neither does she really sing much, she just starts out the song and gets the key phrase of the song. I find it nice how she doesn’t try to force everything out and just sings what she can. She has a nice voice, but she’s way too squeaky and places her voice very much in her nose without any or ture support. 3.Yiren  Why: because she barely sings but from what she has shown during produce she has a nice voice but she’s also very squeaky and nose based. Whenever she sings she’s either flat or doesn’t project properly. In peekaboo she showed no issues with the C5’s but still went into falsetto by how unconfident she is. I think with a little training solely on vocals she will surpass Wonyoung and maybe even Yuna. ———————————————next category——————-——-—————————— visuals (my beauty preference) 1.Yiren  ethereal beauty, she’s Tzuyu Irene and Jisoo’s love child. 2.Yuna  she’s pretty but idk why but i keep on thinking she’ll become even prettier. And then i’ll probably fall in love with her look even more! 3.Wonyoung  she’s one of the people i don’t find attractive but cute, but she has this duality where she can look 23 for sum reason and it’s creepy(good creepy lmao) ———————————————next category—————-——-——————————— Group ranking; bias + bias wrecker + favorite song 1.ITZY  I just love how they actually feel/look like sisters or bestfriends. I fell in love with their chemistry before i fell in love with them, i also find all their voices very pretty and very unique. bias; Lia  bias wrecker; Yuna Favorite song; Nobody Like You 2.IZ*ONE  i loved most of their songs and i like their choreo’s, i just sometimes feel that they are more co workers then members ykwim. I know they are a large group so not everyone will be shipped/seen together but there are alot of member who just don’t interact. But then you have Yena and Yuri who actually seem genuine and i would see hanging out together after disbandment. But i mean that’s my opinion, i may be wrong. bias; Nako  bias wrecker: Yena & Yuri favorite song; Fiesta 3.EVERGLOW  they are a very nice group with talented idols and imo the strongest rap line but their concept FOR ME is just getting boring. And i in general prefer cute concepts so that’s already a min point for them. I hope they will do something different JUST FOR ONCE, not a total concept switch. bias; E:U  bias wrecker; Yiren favorite song; Dun Dun if you read everything; I LOVE YOU! ————————————————the end—————————————————— bye -:)
